derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French cumfirie, based on Latin conferva, from confervere 'heal' (literally 'boil together', referring to the plant's medicinal use)

entry.tran: (用于制作饮料或药物的)聚合草
entry.def: Comfrey is a herb that is used to make drinks and medicines.

means.word_mean: 1. perennial herbs of Europe and Iran; make rapidly growing groundcover for shaded areas
2. leaves make a popular tisane; young leaves used in salads or cooked
